full_text: This is a very popular, easy-to-knit little baby cardigan jacket. Great for a new baby - boy or girl. Knitted top-down with a garter stitch yoke A simple and elegant design Add cute buttons for a contemporary look Sizes: Newborn, 3 months, 6 - 9 months, 9 - 12 months (preemie sizes also available) Requirements: DK (8ply) yarn 4mm needles 3 or 6 buttons To get this free pattern please click on the https link just below ↓ The original pattern was for a 3 button version. And - due to popular demand I have now added a fully-buttoned version too! Matching hat, and booties are also available, if you wish to make a little set.. A lovely gender-neutral design.
name: Ravelry: Babbity Baby Jacket pattern by marianna mel
